articles.title: Ahead of IPO, OYO increases authorised share capital
articles.description: OYO is likely to file for IPO in next few months: Report
articles.content:
Oravel Stays Pvt Ltd, that operates hospitality firm OYO, has approved an increase in the authorised share capital of the company from ₹1.17 crore to ₹901 crore, according to a regulatory filing by the hospitality firm.
The development comes ahead of... [2094 chars]

articles.title: How the cat gets its stripes: It’s genetics, not a folk tale
articles.description: A team of geneticists reported Tuesday in the journal Nature Communications that it had identified a gene in domestic cats that plays a key role in creating the traditional tabby stripe pattern, and that the pattern is evident in embryonic tissue even before hair follicles start to grow.
articles.content:
Written by James Gorman
Folklore is full of stories about the coat patterns of cats: How the tiger got its stripes. How the leopard got its spots. And scientists ask the same questions, although not necessarily about large predators. The research may... [3844 chars]

articles.title: Akshay Kumar’s mother dies after illness: ‘I feel an unbearable pain’
articles.description: Akshay Kumar’s mother Aruna Bhatia is no more. He mourned her death and wrote on Twitter that he feels ‘unbearable pain’. | Bollywood
articles.content:
Actor Akshay Kumar’s mother Aruna Bhatia died on Wednesday morning. He took to Twitter to share the news and expressed his grief.
“She was my core. And today I feel an unbearable pain at the very core of my existence. My maa Smt Aruna Bhatia peaceful... [1947 chars]

articles.title: Afghanistan LIVE Updates: Russian NSA to Meet Ajit Doval, PM Modi Today, US in Touch with India Too on Afghan Crisis

articles.title: Diabetes symptoms: What is the 3 am blood sugar phenomenon?
articles.description: Diabetes symptoms: Most diabetic patients wake up almost every night at the same time, around 3 pm, not by some noise or anything else, but because of the sudden spike in the blood sugar level and much more on Times Of India
articles.content: It is regular for everyone to wake up once or twice at night to drink water or use the loo. After we are done with the work, we get under the sheet and within minutes we fall back asleep to complete our 8 hours of sound sleep. For those suffering fro... [295 chars]

articles.title: India, Russia on the same page on Taliban-ruled Kabul
articles.description: India has forcefully put forward its assessment and concerns over Islamist Taliban ruled Afghanistan to visiting US, UK intelligence chiefs and will convey the same today to visiting Russian security czar. The Taliban 2.0 is no different from its previous avatar. | Latest News India
articles.content:
There is convergence in long term strategic concerns of India and Russia over Taliban-ruled Afghanistan as it will not only destabilise Central Asia but also become a source of terror, opiate drugs, and a major proliferator of conventional weapons.

articles.title: ‘People said India would miss Ashwin. Kohli said, ‘No, we won't’: Naseer Hussain hails Virat’s captaincy in Oval Test
articles.description: Former England captain Nasser Hussain stated that Kohli has passed his captaincy test with ‘flying colours’ as he led his side to a historic Test win. | Cricket
